source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_000<tab>Always a pleasure to greet a new customer. Something I can do for you, friend?
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_000、よく来てくれたな。
「忘れられた騎士亭」は、どこの誰だろうと歓迎するぜ。
この酒場の流儀に馴染める奴なら、な……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_001<tab>Your friend's garnered a fair bit of attention, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Suppose it's the novelty. Some folk haven't ever seen a Lalafell. Anyway, what'll it be?
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_001ここを情報源として使おうなんざ、嬢ちゃんも肝が据わってやがる。
まぁ、嬢ちゃん目当てに客も増えるだろうから、
持ちつ持たれつ、やっていこうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_002<tab>You meet all sorts of people in this line of work. Good, bad─they've all got their reasons. You too, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_002さまざまな出会いが人を作り、その人の過去を作る。
人と人とを結びつけるのも、酒場の魅力だ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_003<tab>Suppose I ought to reinforce the doors in case the good ser thinks to grace us with his presence once more...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_003やれやれ、蒼天騎士団に目をつけられるとは……
うちの酒場も有名になったもんだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_004<tab>Shame Mistress Tataru had to move on. Had grown rather accustomed to having her around.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_004タタルの嬢ちゃんが、いなくなっちまってなぁ……。
せっかくの看板娘だったのに、少し寂しくなっちまうぜ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_005<tab>And there I thought we'd have to make do without her! Don't know how long she'll stick, but we're glad to have her back.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_005タタルの嬢ちゃんが、
またしばらく手伝ってくれるそうでな。
看板娘の復帰は、いつでも大歓迎さ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_006<tab>Some folk just can't let go of the past, whereas others can't wait to bury it.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_006皇都の雰囲気がきな臭くなってきやがった。
客たちの話題も、少しばかり変わってきているんだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_007<tab>We've got a collection going for the families that lost their homes. Might surprise you to learn that a good many contributions come from the Brume. Not that they can spare much, but they know better than anyone up above how rough it is down below.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_007ウチには雲霧街の連中も、多く出入りしているからな。
例の放火騒ぎで、家を失った奴らに何かできないかと、
常連客からカンパを集めて渡してやったんだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_008<tab>Raise a glass to the lost, and we poor bastards who can't forget them. Aye, I know─it was a foolish plan, doomed from the start. But there ain't a man here who doesn't understand.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_008聞いたぜ、ファルコンネストでの暴動の噂……。
俺もこの酒場で、あらゆるものを失った奴らを見てきたが、
他人のできることなんざ、酒を奢ってやることくらいさ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_009<tab>...Never heard of a peace conference ending with a mob chanting for someone's death. Gods help us if we hold a third.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_009客たちが、久々にどいつも同じことを言ってると思ったら、
結局「竜を殺せ」ときたもんだ！
一周しちまったのか、それともこれが最後になるのか……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_010<tab>...They've come, have they? Well, don't you worry about me and mine. I can still wield a blade if the battle spills into the city.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_010いよいよ、この時が来ちまったか……。
大丈夫、自分の面倒は自分で見れるさ。
いざとなったら、剣を取って戦うまでだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_011<tab>When I heard the Horde was at the gates, I let folk take shelter here at the Knight. Those were a tense few hours─even a few cups of wine couldn't dull the edge of fear for some...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_011邪竜の眷属が押し寄せてきたとき、
店を緊急の避難先として開放したんだ。
皆、不安で押しつぶされそうでな……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_012<tab>And then came the news of your victory over Nidhogg. My ears still ring from the deafening cheer that went up from every throat in the room. I swear they meant you to hear it out there on the bridge!
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_012お前さんが、邪竜を討ったという一報が、
もたらされた時の喜びようときたら……。
本当に、見せてやりたかったぜ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_013<tab>Recently, the call went out for able hands to help rebuild, and a bunch of our regulars took up the cause. When I find a moment, I'll take them a little something to wet their whistle.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_013戦争が終わって、やっと復興に取りかかれるようになって……
店でたむろしてた連中も、張りきって街へ働きに行ったよ。
あとで、差し入れでも持っていってやるかな。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_Q1_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_001<tab>What do you do here?
target: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_002<tab>What kind of place is this?
target: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_002<tab>ここはどんなところだ？

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_A1_000_003<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_050<tab>Being that it's my tavern, I suppose I can do whatever I please. For the most part, I dispense drinks and advice, as the situation warrants.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_050この酒場「忘れられた騎士亭」を仕切ってる、
ジブリオンってモンだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_051<tab>Wasn't always so. I did my duty, took my wounds, and hung up my shield, as did the owner before me. You might call it a tradition.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_051この店には、「負傷兵がマスターの座を受け継ぐ」という、
長い伝統があってな。
……そう、俺も元負傷兵さ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_052<tab>They say that the ser who built this tavern was happy to be forgotten. “Rather serve ale instead of steel.” Had a way with words, he did─and with women. But that's a story for another time.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_052遠い昔にこの店を始めた初代マスターも、
戦いに傷つき、剣を捨てた騎士だったらしい。
店の名前も、そこからきているんだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_100<tab>Of all the taverns in all of Ishgard, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> walks into mine...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_100こんな小汚い酒場のことを知りたいってのか？
……物好きもいたもんだ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_101<tab>And there I was thinking you already knew...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_101こんな小汚い酒場のことを知りたいってのか？
……お前さんも物好きだな。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_110<tab>The Forgotten Knight is just another place for travelers and locals alike to partake of food and drink.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_110ここは、「忘れられた騎士亭」……。
常連の酔いどれどもに支えられてる、小汚い酒場だ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_111<tab>Upstairs, you're like to find more well-to-do regulars mingling with travelers. Downstairs, well, that's where you'll find the locals.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_111上の階は、もっぱら任務明けの騎兵たちが商売相手。
階段下の方は、「雲霧街」の連中の溜まり場ってところだな。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_112<tab>Right or wrong, people have a habit of sticking with their own, and Ishgardians are no different.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_112いずれにせよ、悲しみも苦しみも、酒に紛らせて、
忘れちまおうって奴らが、集う酒場ってわけさ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_113<tab>They've got different tastes, to say the least, but we try to cater to them all as best we can.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2FORGOTTENKNIGHT_00278_GIBRILLONT_000_113常連客には、余所者がこの空間に踏み込むのを嫌う奴もいる。
この小汚さに馴染めねぇなら、寄りつかねぇ方が安全だぜ。
